data.actual_result: File's size text appears to get pushed and go into separate lines due to the file's long name
data.expected_result: File's name correctly cuts off into dots, allowing the file's size text to display properly and not in three separate lines
data.short_description: Size text of the new file upload wraps weirdly when uploading a file with a lengthy name
data.steps_to_repro: - Upload a file with a lengthy name - Observe the size text part of the file at the end, best if you use a large file so that you have more time to see it
